title: Chief Meyers Old Mill PSA 6.5, Bender Old Mill for trade
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Chief Meyers Old Mill PSA 6.5, Bender Old Mill for trade
posts.post_content:
This is probably a long shot, but I'll give it a try. I have the following for trade
for a Chief Meyers portrait. If you see any that interests you I am looking for
Meyers with an EPDG, Cycle 460, might also consider a Sweet Cap 460 fac. 25 or 42 os. 
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]
Thanks
Mike
if that ends up for sale I will take it

[quote name="cfc1909" post=793346]if that ends up for sale I will take it[/QUOTE]

Mike, hurry and put whatever price you'd like on your Carolina Brights...you've got a buyer no matter the cost!

[quote name="Chicago206" post=793364]I bid $150[/QUOTE]
Reserve not met. Minimum bid is a Chief Meyers portrait.
Thanks
Mike

Added some trade bait.
Thanks
Mike
I would just like to get the Gray CB-if that is possible

[quote name="cfc1909" post=794798]I would just like to get the Gray CB-if that is possible[/QUOTE]

I think there are 10 guys here who want it....but as Mike has said he wants to trade it away, NOT sell it.
